item.title: 404 - Not Found
item.description:
Sorry the page you are looking for couldn’t be found. Try the start page and look again.

Cheers Jorin

item.title: Interactive Public Advertisment
item.description:
Sure, advertisment works. But its 2014. We have advertisment movies on every second public square and even in the underground.
But it feels like TV, like last century.
Why is public advertisment not social yet?
It should be quiet simple to display an QR code and let people tweet something to the companies account and integrate it live into the advertisment running on the screen.

item.title: Good Looking Air Con
item.description:
It’s totally understandable that not everyone can affort a fancy Air Con system that’s completely invisible. Some people may also decide to get an AC later on.

But does an AC have to look ugly? Why can’t they at least paint them with some nice colors?

item.title: Messenger App Alternative With Cute Avatar
item.description:
You can choose a cute avatar.

And instead of using smileys to show emotions your avatar can do some cool moves.

You also should be able to send text via speech bubbles.

item.title: Streetart Ads
item.description: Company you can anonymously contact to make outdoor advertisement. Graffiti, stickers, flyers, posters, performance, …

item.title: Toilet DJ
item.description: I would me so much more willing to give someone standing in front of a toilet money if the person would have a little DJ table and I could enjoy some music in there.

item.title: Adventure in Sandwich Land
item.description:
I would love to see someone starting a blog about what is possible to do with a sandwich.

There are basically no limits what you use a sandwich maker for.

item.title: Bier and Ice in Mixer
item.description: I just wonder what it tastes like if you put beer and ice cubes in a mixer.

item.title: The Not Naked Nudist Movie
item.description:
A little challenge for a filmmaker:

Make a movie where no person wears anything for the whole movie.

However, you should never see certain parts of the body.

Also, watchers shouldn’t realise no one wears clothes. It should just feel like any other movie.

item.title: Online Shop via Live Cam
item.description:
If you have a local store and also want to sell stuff online you could do so by simple installing some web cams in your store.

This way people would see what you sell. Or if you already have an existing online shop you could make different parts of the web cam picture clickable and connect it to the products in the online shop.

item.title: Local Alarm
item.description:
I would like to have an app where you can mark an area on a map and as soon as you get into the area an alarm will be triggered.

This would be helpful for example if fall asleep while driving home from a long night.

item.title: Party in the Dark
item.description:
There is stuff like dining in the dark but have you ever been to a party in a completely dark room?

I am wondering with what ways of communicating people would come up with.

You also could have some guards watching the hole thing with night vision cameras.

item.title: Templerun from the Monsters Point of View
item.description: Wouldn’t it be interesting to play a Monster chaising people?

item.title: Party of Stranger
item.description: Throw a Party where no one is allowed to bring someone he knows. So there are only strangers. Could be interesting.
